title: Virginia Tech falls to Texas 81-73 in first round of NCAA Tournament - VT hokiesports.com
content:
1. Virginia Tech falls to Texas 81-73 in first round of NCAA Tournament  VT hokiesports.com
  2. Texas Techâ€™s Unusual Defense Stifles Montana State  The New York Times
  3. Montana State's Season Ends with First Round Loss to Texas Tech in San Diego  Bobcats Athletics
  4. RECAP: Red Raiders roll into NCAA Tournament Second Round - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
  5. WATCH: Texas hits half-court buzzer-beater vs. Virginia Tech to take lead into halftime in first round matchup  CBS Sports
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Andrew Jones scored 21 points, Marcus Carr beat the halftime buzzer with a shot from well beyond halfcourt to put Texas ahead for good, and the Longhorns beat Virginia Tech 81-73 on Friday for their first NCAA Tournament victory since 2014.
